TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMenuItem implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Interface for direct access to a previously created menu item.

remarks.para: Interface for direct access to a previously created menu item.
An Item is returned by calling one of the methods.

For a feature set of specific menu types, see .
Developer Guides
For information about creating menus, read the Menus developer guide.

Docs.summary: Gets the .

remarks.para: Gets the .

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getActionView", "()Landroid/view/View;", "GetGetActionViewHandler:Android.Views.IMenuItemInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Returns the currently set action view for this menu item.

remarks.para: Returns the currently set action view for this menu item.

Docs.summary: Return the char for this menu item's alphabetic shortcut.

remarks.para: Return the char for this menu item's alphabetic shortcut.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CollapseActionView() cil managed

Docs.summary: Collapse the action view associated with this menu item.

remarks.para: Collapse the action view associated with this menu item. The menu item must have an action view set, as well as the showAsAction flag . If a listener has been set using it will have its method invoked. The listener may return false from this method to prevent collapsing the action view.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ExpandActionView() cil managed

Docs.summary: Expand the action view associated with this menu item.

remarks.para: Expand the action view associated with this menu item. The menu item must have an action view set, as well as the showAsAction flag . If a listener has been set using it will have its method invoked. The listener may return false from this method to prevent expanding the action view.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getGroupId", "()I", "GetGetGroupIdHandler:Android.Views.IMenuItemInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Return the group identifier that this menu item is part of.

remarks.para: Return the group identifier that this menu item is part of. The group identifier can not be changed after the menu is created.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("hasSubMenu", "()Z", "GetHasSubMenuHandler:Android.Views.IMenuItemInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Check whether this item has an associated sub-menu.

remarks.para: Check whether this item has an associated sub-menu. I.e. it is a sub-menu of another menu.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getIcon", "()Landroid/graphics/drawable/Drawable;", "GetGetIconHandler:Android.Views.IMenuItemInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Returns the icon for this item as a Drawable (getting it from resources if it hasn't been loaded before).

remarks.para: Returns the icon for this item as a Drawable (getting it from resources if it hasn't been loaded before).

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getIntent", "()Landroid/content/Intent;", "GetGetIntentHandler:Android.Views.IMenuItemInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Return the Intent associated with this item.

remarks.para: Return the Intent associated with this item. This returns a reference to the Intent which you can change as desired to modify what the Item is holding.

Docs.summary: Returns true if this menu item's action view has been expanded.

remarks.para: Returns true if this menu item's action view has been expanded.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("isCheckable", "()Z", "GetIsCheckableHandler:Android.Views.IMenuItemInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

remarks.para: Return whether the item can currently display a check mark.

Docs.summary: Return whether the item is currently displaying a check mark.

remarks.para: Return whether the item is currently displaying a check mark.

Docs.summary: Return the enabled state of the menu item.

remarks.para: Return the enabled state of the menu item.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("isVisible", "()Z", "GetIsVisibleHandler:Android.Views.IMenuItemInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Return the visibility of the menu item.

remarks.para: Return the visibility of the menu item.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getItemId", "()I", "GetGetItemIdHandler:Android.Views.IMenuItemInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Return the identifier for this menu item.

remarks.para: Return the identifier for this menu item. The identifier can not be changed after the menu is created.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getMenuInfo", "()Landroid/view/ContextMenu$ContextMenuInfo;", "GetGetMenuInfoHandler:Android.Views.IMenuItemInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Gets the extra information linked to this menu item.

remarks.para: Gets the extra information linked to this menu item. This extra information is set by the View that added this menu item to the menu.

Docs.summary: Return the char for this menu item's numeric (12-key) shortcut.

remarks.para: Return the char for this menu item's numeric (12-key) shortcut.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getOrder", "()I", "GetGetOrderHandler:Android.Views.IMenuItemInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Return the category and order within the category of this item.

remarks.para: Return the category and order within the category of this item. This item will be shown before all items (within its category) that have order greater than this value.

An order integer contains the item's category (the upper bits of the integer; set by or/add the category with the order within the category) and the ordering of the item within that category (the lower bits). Example categories are , , , . See for a full list.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetActionProvider(class Android.Views.ActionProvider actionProvider) cil managed

Docs.param: The action provider.
Docs.summary: Sets the responsible for creating an action view if the item is placed on the action bar.

remarks.para: Sets the responsible for creating an action view if the item is placed on the action bar. The provider also provides a default action invoked if the item is placed in the overflow menu.
Note: Setting an action provider overrides the action view set via or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetActionView(class Android.Views.View view) cil managed

Docs.param: View to use for presenting this item to the user.
Docs.summary: Set an action view for this menu item.

remarks.para: Set an action view for this menu item. An action view will be displayed in place of an automatically generated menu item element in the UI when this item is shown as an action within a parent.
Note: Setting an action view overrides the action provider set via .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetActionView(int32 resId) cil managed

Docs.param: Layout resource to use for presenting this item to the user.
Docs.summary: Set an action view for this menu item.

remarks.para: Set an action view for this menu item. An action view will be displayed in place of an automatically generated menu item element in the UI when this item is shown as an action within a parent.
Note: Setting an action view overrides the action provider set via .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetAlphabeticShortcut(char alphaChar) cil managed

Docs.param: The alphabetic shortcut key. This is the shortcut when using a keyboard with alphabetic keys.
Docs.summary: Change the alphabetic shortcut associated with this item.

remarks.para: Change the alphabetic shortcut associated with this item. The shortcut will be triggered when the key that generates the given character is pressed along with the ctrl key. Case is not significant and shortcut characters will be displayed in lower case. Note that menu items with the characters '\b' or '\n' as shortcuts will get triggered by the Delete key or Carriage Return key, respectively.
See for the menu types that support shortcuts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetCheckable(bool checkable) cil managed

Docs.param: Set to true to allow a check mark, false to disallow. The default is false.
Docs.summary: Control whether this item can display a check mark.

remarks.para: Control whether this item can display a check mark. Setting this does not actually display a check mark (see for that); rather, it ensures there is room in the item in which to display a check mark.
See for the menu types that support check marks.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetChecked(bool checked) cil managed

Docs.param: Set to true to display a check mark, false to hide it. The default value is false.
Docs.summary: Control whether this item is shown with a check mark.

remarks.para: Control whether this item is shown with a check mark. Note that you must first have enabled checking with or else the check mark will not appear. If this item is a member of a group that contains mutually-exclusive items (set via , the other items in the group will be unchecked.
See for the menu types that support check marks.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetEnabled(bool enabled) cil managed

Docs.param: If true then the item will be invokable; if false it is won't be invokable.
Docs.summary: Sets whether the menu item is enabled.

remarks.para: Sets whether the menu item is enabled. Disabling a menu item will not allow it to be invoked via its shortcut. The menu item will still be visible.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetIcon(class Android.Graphics.Drawables.Drawable icon) cil managed

Docs.param: The new icon (as a Drawable) to be displayed.
Docs.summary: Change the icon associated with this item.

remarks.para: Change the icon associated with this item. This icon will not always be shown, so the title should be sufficient in describing this item. See for the menu types that support icons.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetIcon(int32 iconRes) cil managed

Docs.param: The new icon (as a resource ID) to be displayed.
Docs.summary: Change the icon associated with this item.

remarks.para: Change the icon associated with this item. This icon will not always be shown, so the title should be sufficient in describing this item. See for the menu types that support icons.
This method will set the resource ID of the icon which will be used to lazily get the Drawable when this item is being shown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetIntent(class Android.Content.Intent intent) cil managed

Docs.param: The Intent to associated with the item. This Intent object is not copied, so be careful not to modify it later.
Docs.summary: Change the Intent associated with this item.

remarks.para: Change the Intent associated with this item. By default there is no Intent associated with a menu item. If you set one, and nothing else handles the item, then the default behavior will be to call with the given Intent.

Note that setIntent() can not be used with the versions of that take a Runnable, because does not return a value so there is no way to tell if it handled the item. In this case it is assumed that the Runnable always handles the item, and the intent will never be started.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetNumericShortcut(char numericChar) cil managed

Docs.param: The numeric shortcut key. This is the shortcut when using a 12-key (numeric) keyboard.
Docs.summary: Change the numeric shortcut associated with this item.

remarks.para: Change the numeric shortcut associated with this item.
See for the menu types that support shortcuts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetOnActionExpandListener(class Android.Views.IMenuItemOnActionExpandListener listener) cil managed

Docs.param: Listener that will respond to expand/collapse events
Docs.summary: Set an on this menu item to be notified when the associated action view is expanded or collapsed.

remarks.para: Set an on this menu item to be notified when the associated action view is expanded or collapsed. The menu item must be configured to expand or collapse its action view using the flag .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetOnMenuItemClickListener(class Android.Views.IMenuItemOnMenuItemClickListener menuItemClickListener) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to receive invokations.
Docs.summary: Set a custom listener for invocation of this menu item.

remarks.para: Set a custom listener for invocation of this menu item. In most situations, it is more efficient and easier to use or .

MemberSignature.Value: public Android.Views.IMenuItem SetShortcut (char numericChar, char alphaChar);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetShortcut(char numericChar, char alphaChar) cil managed

Docs.param: The numeric shortcut key. This is the shortcut when using a numeric (e.g., 12-key) keyboard.
The alphabetic shortcut key. This is the shortcut when using a keyboard with alphabetic keys.
Docs.summary: Change both the numeric and alphabetic shortcut associated with this item.

remarks.para: Change both the numeric and alphabetic shortcut associated with this item. Note that the shortcut will be triggered when the key that generates the given character is pressed along with the ctrl key. Also note that case is not significant and that alphabetic shortcut characters will be displayed in lower case.
See for the menu types that support shortcuts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetShowAsAction(valuetype Android.Views.ShowAsAction actionEnum) cil managed

Docs.param: How the item should display. One of , , or . SHOW_AS_ACTION_NEVER is the default.
Docs.summary: Sets how this item should display in the presence of an Action Bar.

remarks.para: Sets how this item should display in the presence of an Action Bar. The parameter actionEnum is a flag set. One of , , or should be used, and you may optionally OR the value with . SHOW_AS_ACTION_WITH_TEXT requests that when the item is shown as an action, it should be shown with a text label.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetShowAsActionFlags(valuetype Android.Views.ShowAsAction actionEnum) cil managed

Docs.param: How the item should display. One of , , or . SHOW_AS_ACTION_NEVER is the default.
Docs.summary: Sets how this item should display in the presence of an Action Bar.

remarks.para: Sets how this item should display in the presence of an Action Bar. The parameter actionEnum is a flag set. One of , , or should be used, and you may optionally OR the value with . SHOW_AS_ACTION_WITH_TEXT requests that when the item is shown as an action, it should be shown with a text label.
Note: This method differs from only in that it returns the current MenuItem instance for call chaining.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetTitle(class Java.Lang.ICharSequence title) cil managed

Docs.param: The new text to be displayed.
Docs.summary: Change the title associated with this item.

remarks.para: Change the title associated with this item.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetTitle(int32 title) cil managed

Docs.param: The resource id of the new text to be displayed.
Docs.summary: Change the title associated with this item.

remarks.para: Change the title associated with this item.
Some menu types do not sufficient space to show the full title, and instead a condensed title is preferred. See for more information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetTitleCondensed(class Java.Lang.ICharSequence title) cil managed

Docs.param: The new text to be displayed as the condensed title.
Docs.summary: Change the condensed title associated with this item.

remarks.para: Change the condensed title associated with this item. The condensed title is used in situations where the normal title may be too long to be displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Views.IMenuItem SetVisible(bool visible) cil managed

Docs.param: If true then the item will be visible; if false it is hidden.
Docs.summary: Sets the visibility of the menu item.

remarks.para: Sets the visibility of the menu item. Even if a menu item is not visible, it may still be invoked via its shortcut (to completely disable an item, set it to invisible and ).

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getSubMenu", "()Landroid/view/SubMenu;", "GetGetSubMenuHandler:Android.Views.IMenuItemInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Get the sub-menu to be invoked when this item is selected, if it has one.

remarks.para: Get the sub-menu to be invoked when this item is selected, if it has one. See .

Docs.summary: Retrieve the current condensed title of the item.

remarks.para: Retrieve the current condensed title of the item. If a condensed title was never set, it will return the normal title.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: Android.Runtime.Register("getTitle", "()Ljava/lang/CharSequence;", "GetGetTitleHandler:Android.Views.IMenuItemInvoker, Mono.Android, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null")

Docs.summary: Retrieve the current title of the item.

remarks.para: Retrieve the current title of the item.
